languages.text: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж восстанавливает 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Если у персонажа осталось меньше 20% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он восстанавливает 20% от максимального значения.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the character's turn they restore 10% of their maximum wounds. If the character has less than 20% of wounds left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.
At the start of the character's turn, they restore 10% of their maximum wounds. If the character has less than 20% of wounds left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

languages.text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del personaje, recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Si al personaje le quedan menos del 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, en vez de eso recupera un 20 % de sus heridas máximas.
languages.original_text: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del personaje, recupera un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Si al personaje le quedan menos del 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, en vez de eso recupera un 20 % de sus heridas máximas.

languages.text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%を回復する。このキャラクターの残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が20%未満のとき、代わりに最大体力の20%を回復する。
languages.original_text: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%を回復する。このキャラクターの残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が20%未満のとき、代わりに最大体力の20%を回復する。

languages.text: 当角色{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。如果角色剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于20%，则恢复最大生命值的20%。
languages.original_text: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

traits.locale_text: 当角色{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。如果角色剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于20%，则恢复最大生命值的20%。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Charakters werden 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} wiederhergestellt. Wenn der Charakter weniger als 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig hat, werden stattdessen 20 % seiner maximalen Wunden wiederhergestellt.
languages.original_text: At the start of the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they restore 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the character has less than 20% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left, they restore 20% of their maximum wounds instead.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Charakters werden 10% seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} wiederhergestellt. Wenn der Charakter weniger als 20% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig hat, werden stattdessen 20% seiner maximalen Wunden wiederhergestellt.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du personnage, 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont restaurés. S'il lui reste moins de 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, 20% de sa réserve de blessures maximum sont restaurés.
